headline: Cognizant Technology Sets Sights on AI Agents Market, Open-Sources Neuro AI Multi-Agent Accelerator
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp (NASDAQ:CTSH) is strategically positioning itself in the burgeoning AI Agents market. On May 21, the information technology and consulting company confirmed the open-sourcing of its AI multi-agent platform Neuro AI Multi-Agent Accelerator. By open-sourcing Neuro AI Multi-Agent Accelerator for research and academic use, Cognizant Technology Solutions positions itself in the rapidly […]
